PLC-LOGIC-KIT-BM2 - Set
PLC-LOGIC-KIT-BM2
-
Set 1064629
PLC logic set consisting of: plug-in basic logic module (BM2) and eight relay terminal blocks with Push-in connection (1 changeover contact, 250 V AC/DC, max.6 A)
Free download available.
Downloads
Product details
Expand all
Collapse all
Set consists of
PLC-V8C/PT-24DC/BM2 - Controller 2907446
PLC-RPT- 24DC/21 - Relay module 2900299
Technical data
Notes
Notes on operation
For proper use, the specifications of the installation directive (see Downloads) must be observed. For applications or use with third-party products, the specifications, and the safety and warning instructions of the respective third-party manufacturer must also be met.
